p: In all cases, we used circular shaped interrogation windows and universal outlier detection (remove threshold 2, insert threshold 3, epsilon=0.1, 3 × 3 × 3 neighbourhood). The resulting vector field was smoothed with a Gaussian filter in a 3 × 3 × 3 neighbourhood. For the sketches in Figs 2b,c,e and 4a, the fields were computed with lower resolution for better visibility.
